title: Hilarious moment a little dog runs out of a supermarket in Brazil after grabbing a bag of donuts
text:
A Brazilian supermarket previously robbed three times had an unexpected thief last week when a little dog ran off with a bag of donuts.

The mischievous pooch was caught by the store's CCTV camera heading straight for the cookie aisle last Thursday morning.

The sly woof grabbed a pack of coconut donuts and made its way for the exit doors.

A dog surprised supermarket shoppers last week in Brazil when it ran off with a bag of donuts but dropped it outside the store after it was frightened by yelling customers

The supermarket owner said the dog returned later in the day and was fed by the staff

Supermarket owner Paulo Cardoso told Brazilian outlet G1 that customers started yelling when they saw the dog with the bag in its mouth after removing it from the bottom shelf.

The scared dog dropped the bag outside the store and ran off.

However, it returned to the scene of the crime later during the day and was fed by the supermarket employees.

'Customers thought it was fantastic for a dog to 'rob' a market. Me too, because I had never seen it,' Cardoso said.

'It is unheard of. But the puppy will become a customer if he does [return]. Let's take care of him.'
description: Surveillance video captures the hilarious moment a supermarket in Brazil is surprised by a dog who robbed a bag of donuts last week.
